availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: C. A. Wandelohr (Pendleton County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk. Franklin County, Pennsylvania native. Married to Eleanor Mullins Wanderlohr in 1845. Married to Rachel Hitch Wanderlohr in 1857. Father of James K. Wandelohr, C. B. Wandelohr, Annie Wandelohr, and Cora Wandelohr. Farmer in Pendleton County. Circuit Court Clerk of Pendleton County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 411A.
Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky for the Fiscal Year ending October 10, 1863(Frankfort, KY: Commonwealth Office, 1864), 32.
W. H. Perrin, J. H. Battle, and G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State, 7th ed. (Louisville: F. A. Battey and Company, 1887), 905.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film 000272801, p. 397.
